name: Karian Cross
overview:
This is an original falling-pieces puzzle game. Get three like-colored objects together to make them disappear. Getting multiple combinations causes more blocks to fall on your opponents side.

Karian Cross is falling-piece puzzle game, similar to Puyo Puyo or Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo. The player must combine falling blocks - 3 of the same color next to each other disappear from the board. Longer combinations create additional blocks in opponents screen - Just like Tetris, loses the one who cannot insert new elements.
